  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/2444</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/2444</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Le pronom on</string>
            <string language="en">The French pronoun "on"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Französische Pronomen-"on"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">"on" français de pronom</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">"on" francês do pronome</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">"on" francese di pronome</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η γαλλική αντωνυμία ""</string>
          </title>
          <language>fr</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Miniunitat didàtica (MUD) interactiva sobre l'ús del pronom "on". Conté una part de presentació de casos i uns apartats de pràctica, d'autoevaluació i d'eines amb la síntesi de la regla gramatical.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive mini teaching unit (MUD) on the main uses of the pronoun "on" in French. It includes an introductory section illustrating different situations, and sections for practice, self-assessment, and tools with a summary of the grammatical rules.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">gramàtica</string>
            <string language="en">grammar</string>
            <string language="es">gramática</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">fonologia</string>
            <string language="en">phonology</string>
            <string language="es">fonología</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">ortografia</string>
            <string language="en">spelling</string>
            <string language="es">ortografía</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">material didàctic</string>
            <string language="en">teaching materials</string>
            <string language="es">material didáctico</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive unterrichtende Minimaßeinheit 
(SCHLAMM) auf dem Hauptgebrauch Pronomen-"on" auf französisch. 
Es schließt ein einleitendes Kapitel ein, das unterschiedliche 
Situationen veranschaulichen, und Kapitel für Praxis, Selbstbewertung
und Hilfsmittel mit einer Zusammenfassung der grammatischen 
Richtlinien.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mini unité d'enseignement interactive (BOUE) sur 
les utilisations principales de "on" de pronom en français. Il 
inclut une section préliminaire illustrant différentes situations, 
et des sections pour la pratique, le art de l'auto-portrait-assessment, et les 
outils avec un sommaire des règles grammaticales.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unidade ensinando mini interativa (LAMA) nos usos 
principais de "on" do pronome em francês. Inclui uma seção 
introdutória que ilustram situações diferentes, e seções para a 
prática, o self-assessment, e as ferramentas com um sumário das 
réguas gramaticais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mini unità d'istruzione interattiva (FANGO) sulle
utilizzazioni principali di "on" di pronome in francese. Include
una sezione introduttiva che illustrano le situazioni differenti e le 
sezioni per pratica, la valutazione di se stesso e gli strumenti con 
un sommario delle regole grammaticali.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογική μίνι μονάδα διδασκαλίας (ΛΑΣΠΗ) στις 
βασικές χρήσεις της αντωνυμίας "" στα γαλλικά. Περιλαμβάνει
ένα εισαγωγικό τμήμα που επεξηγούν τις διαφορετικές καταστάσεις,
και τα τμήματα της πρακτικής, της αυτοαξιολόγησης, και των 
εργαλείων με μια περίληψη των γραμματικών κανόνων.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grammatik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Phonology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rechtschreibung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lehrmittel</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εκπαιδευτικά υλικά</string>
          </keyword>
